name: wr.umbracophonemanager
description: Umbraco Phone Manager is an Umbraco package to manage and display marketing campaign phone numbers on your site to your customers. Based on various criteria, a relevant telephone number can be automatically displayed to each customer visiting your website based on how they got there.
readme: Umbraco Phone Manager is an Umbraco package to manage and display marketing campaign phone numbers on your site to your customers. Based on various criteria, a relevant telephone number can be automatically displayed to each customer visiting your website based on how they got there.
